title: Software Engineer
description:
• Implement backend services and build reliable infrastructure.
  • Write high quality, maintainable and human readable code and write tests to assure quality.
full_description: 工作内容:Implement backend services and build reliable infrastructure.Write high quality, maintainable and human readable code and write tests to assure quality.Responsible to develop technical maintenance plansVerify the quality of product; verify functionality and data output against requirementsSupport off-hours launch and monitoring of systems with operation teams as neededLog, manage, and retest defects in bug tracking system我们是第三方求职机构,联合强资源把控的Client Company,寻找核心关键人物,如投资人董事席位、企业创始人人脉等,获取企业当下用人需求,针对性深挖候选人优势特点,匹配企业岗位需求,提升求职成功率。实习期,OPT、OPT Extension Sponsor;2-3个月转正考核,Sponsor H1BJob Types: Full-time, InternshipPay: $50,000.00 - $110,000.00 per yearBenefits:401(k)Dental insuranceHealth insurancePaid time offVision insuranceSchedule:Monday to FridayEducation:Bachelor's (Preferred)Experience:REST: 1 year (Preferred)Java: 1 year (Preferred)Work Location:One locationWork Remotely:Yes, temporarily due to COVID-19COVID-19 Precaution(s):Remote interview process
